Reviews.Title: okay for the price
Reviews.Author: 242bahamas
Reviews.Content: I guess I can say that this is okay for the price. Ordered two and one arrived both locked and defective. I wanted to return both phones at the sellers expense but my cousin fell in love with this one but beware of the black one.

Reviews.Title: Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Stacy-Ann
Reviews.Content: Nice cell phone... Not so hard to use as most chinese phones are... The only problem I have is that using two sim cards in the phone decreases the battery life significantly.

ProductInfo.Features:
QUAN BAND: GSM850/900/1800/1900 MHZ, DUAL SIM CARD SLOT
MICRO SD CARD SLOT UP TO 4 GB, VIDEO RECORDER, BLUETOOTH
SUPPORT INTERNET, MP3, MP4, RADIO FM, Massage, Support Message:SMS, MMS
Alarm/Calculator/Calendar/ Games/ Clock/eBook reader/ torch/calculator
APPS:SUPPORT FACEBOOK, EBUDDY, TWITTER, SOUND RECORDER
ProductInfo.Name: UNLOCKED QWERTY DUAL SIM TV FM GSM CELL PHONE i7 PRO WHITE
